name: Randomizer
short_description:
Random sequence generators for Java objects, which currently provide you with 3 specialized generators. 

The simplest of them - Randomizer - gives every Object an equal chance to be selected from the group.

The useful RandomizerSet - shuffles the provided Objects and returns the next object in queue once needed. 

The complex RandomizerMap - Writing a MMORPG? The rarest drop, the better! This beauty is for you. 

None of them fits your needs? No problem, the parent type RandomSelector provides you with just the right interface to write your own.
summary: Random sequence generators for Java objects
